original_text: This only would I learn of you, Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?
korean_text: 내가 너희에게서 다만 이것을 알려 하노니 너희가 성령을 받은 것이 율법의 행위로냐 혹은 듣고 믿음으로냐

sentences.original_text: This only would I learn of you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게서 오직 이것만 알고자 하노니

sentences.original_text: by the works of the law
or by the hearing of faith?
